jason
v1.4.4

      View Source API Reference jason v1.4.4

      Modules

      Jason

      A blazing fast JSON parser and generator in pure Elixir.

      Jason.DecodeError
      Jason.Encode

      Utilities for encoding elixir values to JSON.

      Jason.EncodeError
      Jason.Encoder

      Protocol controlling how a value is encoded to JSON.

      Jason.Formatter

      Pretty-printing and minimizing functions for JSON-encoded data.

      Jason.Fragment

      Provides a way to inject an already-encoded JSON structure into a to-be-encoded structure in optimized fashion.

      Jason.Helpers

      Provides macro facilities for partial compile-time encoding of JSON.

      Jason.OrderedObject
      Jason.Sigil
